nodes.text: Around the time of the Cold War, a proxy conflict between the reconstituted Sith Empire and Galactic Republic, a scavenger competed with Tharan Cedrax in order to buy a hologram program named Holiday which the Hutt Glorzo had decided to sell. Glorzo then issued a contest for the two, where the first to acquire a stone in the asteroid Rukabi Major and bring it back to the Hutt would win Holiday. Eventually, Tharan Cedrax triumphed over the scavenger on this contest and received Holiday.
